short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on utility icon for Call.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Ever imagined what if you could make a call right from the browser and have complete control of your data that is shared?
 
Well, that stops here!
 
Introducing ContextToCall (Softphone), a browser extension that identifies the contact number present on the website and allows you to make a call to that number without need for your phone right from your internet browser. You may also download the Android App from Google Play Store or iOS app from AppStore to have seamless switching between your mobile devices and the Browser. Besides, you may use it to call any number worldwide at very economical rates. Optionally, you may buy a local number for more than 200+ countries and add wings to your business, save costs on long distance and international calls.
 
ContextToCall brings the power of data sharing back into the hands of consumers.
 
By the way, did we mention, we support calling 200+ countries for FREE!
